title: 313: The Pros & Cons Of Anabolic Steroids
description: Tennis star Maria Sharapova has been suspended for two years for using a banned performance enhancing drug. This has prompted Sal, Adam & Justin to revisit the pros and cons of steroid use. Get the Mind Pump Butt Builder Bundle at www.mindpumpmedia.com Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week the best reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpmedia.com.
